column5: Attn: Ice Anglers The 2019 HT Ice Tour kicks off on Thurs. Jan. 10, 2019 at Gagnon Sports in Oshawa at 6:30 PM! Feel free to come out for an informative session of seminars presented by "Big Jim" McLaughlin, Wil Wegman and me. Refreshments, lots of door prizes from HT and Navionics! Here is the seminar schedule so far, hopefully, you can make it out! Identify yourself as a board member and I'll have a little something for you! Thurs. Jan. 10, 2019 6:30 - 9:00 PM - Gagnon Sports 385 Bloor St. West Oshawa, ON L1J 5Y5 Sat. Jan. 12, 2019 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM - The OFAH Mario Cortell Hunting & Fishing Heritage Centre 4601 Guthrie Drive, Peterborough, ON K9J 8L5 Thurs. Jan. 17, 2019 6:30 - 9:00 PM - Fishing World 2411 Barton St. East, Hamilton, ON L8E 2W9 Looking forward to seeing and meeting in person a few board members. These events are sponsored by HT Enterprises, Navionics and Vexilar and there is N/C to attend and lots of info and door prizes to be shared! #HTIceTour #HTProStaff #NavionicsSponsored
Coming to Peterborough!?   That's great. I'll be sure to pass this along.
Appreciate it! Hope to see you there! Cheers, Dave
Very nice wish I was closer to attend.  Art
